org.netbeans.api.search.ui

Class SearchPatternController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.ui.SearchPatternController

  • public final class SearchPatternController
extends Object
    Controller for a combo box for selection and editing of search patterns.
    Since:
    api.search/1.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SearchPatternController.Option
      Options of search patterns.

public SearchPattern getSearchPattern()
        Get search pattern currently represented by this controller.

      • setSearchPattern

        public void setSearchPattern(@NonNull
                             SearchPattern searchPattern)

      • bind

        public void bind(@NonNull
                 SearchPatternController.Option option,
                 @NonNull
                 AbstractButton button)
        Bind an abstract button (usually checkbox) to a SearchPattern option.
        Parameters:
        option - Option whose value the button should represent.
        button - Button to control and display the option.

      • bindMatchTypeComboBox

        public void bindMatchTypeComboBox(@NonNull
                                  JComboBox comboBox)
        Bind Match Type option to a combo box.
        Parameters:
        comboBox - Combo box to control and display the match type. The model of the combo box can contain only items of type SearchPattern.MatchType. SearchPattern.MatchType.LITERAL and SearchPattern.MatchType.REGEXP are mandatory in the model.
        Since:
        api.search/1.11

      • unbind

        public void unbind(@NonNull
                   SearchPatternController.Option option,
                   @NonNull
                   AbstractButton button)
        Unbind a button from a SearchPattern option.

      • getComponent

        public final T getComponent()

      • addChangeListener

        public final void addChangeListener(@NonNull
                                    ChangeListener listener)
        Adds a ChangeListener to the listener list. The same listener object may be added more than once, and will be called as many times as it is added. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ChangeListener to be added.

      • removeChangeListener

        public final void removeChangeListener(@NonNull
                                       ChangeListener listener)
        Removes a ChangeListener from the listener list. If listener was added more than once, it will be notified one less time after being removed. If listener is null, or was never added, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ChangeListener to be removed.

      • fireChange

        protected final void fireChange()
        Fires a change event to all registered listeners.

      • hasListeners

        public final boolean hasListeners()
        Checks if there are any listeners registered to this ChangeSupport.
        Returns:
        true if there are one or more listeners for the given property, false otherwise.
